title: Sampler, 1741
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: Assortment of religious and secular motifs including Adam and Eve with the tree and the coat-of-arms of the city of Hamburg. Two alphabets and a set of numerals at the top. Initials and date in central cartouche at top supported by two angels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1741.Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation. 1931-47-8.
